Class SpringlesConnectionBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.fbk.dkm.springles.base.SpringlesConnectionBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SpringlesConnection, org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryConnection

    public class SpringlesConnectionBase
extends Object
implements SpringlesConnection
    Base implementation of SpringlesConnection.
